oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Two Babies in Stroller
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Edwin Best
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greenback (Tenn.); Best, Anna Elizabeth; Best, Nora Ellen;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Twin infants in a stroller with 1919 Greenback in background. The twins were born on March 26, 1919. The stroller has large wheels and is a double stroller with separate seats for each child. Mr. and Mrs. John Best are the parents. Per Edwin Best Jr., Nora died in 1995 and Elizabeth died in 2008.
